alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Houston; Peach; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Macon, southwestern Peach, southwestern Houston, south central Crawford and southeastern Taylor Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Marshallville, or 9 miles southwest of Fort Valley, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Fort Valley, Marshallville, Reynolds, Saint Louis, Nakomis, Meadowdale, Grovania, Elko, Garden Valley, Grove Park, Hicks, Potterville, Moss Oak, Winchester and Henderson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
